biotools.summary: BLAST-like search tool that allows users to quickly search against the PDB for RNA structures sharing similar substructures with a specified query RNA structure. Input is an RNA 3D structure in PDB format, output includes a graphical display showing structural superposition.

bioschemas.name: R3D-BLAST
bioschemas.summary: BLAST-like search tool that allows users to quickly search against the PDB for RNA structures sharing similar substructures with a specified query RNA structure. Input is an RNA 3D structure in PDB format, output includes a graphical display showing structural superposition.
